contents:
Deprecationslink

The API listed below will be removed in the next major release!

ConnectableObservable Will be removed in v8. Use connectable to create a connectable observable. If you are using the `refCount` method of `ConnectableObservable`, use the share operator instead. Details: 将在 v8 中删除。使用 connectable 创建一个可连接的 observable。如果你使用的是 `ConnectableObservable` 的 `refCount` 方法，请改用 share 操作符。详细信息：
Operator Internal implementation detail, do not use directly. Will be made internal in v8. 内部实现细节，请勿直接使用。将在 v8 中内部化。
asap Renamed to asapScheduler. Will be removed in v8. 重命名为 asapScheduler。将在 v8 中删除。
async Renamed to asyncScheduler. Will be removed in v8. 重命名为 asyncScheduler。将在 v8 中删除。
queue Renamed to queueScheduler. Will be removed in v8. 重命名为 queueScheduler。将在 v8 中删除。
animationFrame Renamed to animationFrameScheduler. Will be removed in v8. 重命名为 animationFrameScheduler。将在 v8 中删除。
Scheduler Scheduler is an internal implementation detail of RxJS, and should not be used directly. Rather, create your own class and implement SchedulerLike. Will be made internal in v8. 调度器是 RxJS 的内部实现细节，不应该直接使用。相反，创建你自己的类并实现 SchedulerLike。将在 v8 中内部化。
Notification It is NOT recommended to create instances of `Notification` directly. Rather, try to create POJOs matching the signature outlined in ObservableNotification. For example: `{ kind: 'N', value: 1 }`, `{ kind: 'E', error: new Error('bad') }`, or `{ kind: 'C' }`. Will be removed in v8. 不建议直接创建 `Notification` 实例。相反，尝试创建与 ObservableNotification 中概述的签名匹配的 POJO。例如： `{ kind: 'N', value: 1 }` , `{ kind: 'E', error: new Error('bad') }` 或 `{ kind: 'C' }`。将在 v8 中删除。
NotificationKind Use a string literal instead. `NotificationKind` will be replaced with a type alias in v8. It will not be replaced with a const enum as those are not compatible with isolated modules. 请改用字符串文字。`NotificationKind` 在 v8 中将被替换为类型别名。它不会被 const 枚举替换，因为它们与隔离模块不兼容。
empty Replaced with the EMPTY constant or scheduled (e.g. `scheduled([], scheduler)`). Will be removed in v8. 替换为 EMPTY 常量或 scheduled（例如 `scheduled([], scheduler)`）。将在 v8 中删除。
never Replaced with the NEVER constant. Will be removed in v8. 替换为 NEVER 常量。将在 v8 中删除。
of The `scheduler` parameter will be removed in v8. Use `scheduled`. Details: `scheduler` 参数将在 v8 中删除。请改用 `scheduled`。详细信息：
pairs Use `from(Object.entries(obj))` instead. Will be removed in v8. 使用 `from(Object.entries(obj))` 代替。将在 v8 中删除。
combineAll Renamed to combineLatestAll. Will be removed in v8. 重命名为 combineLatestAll。将在 v8 中删除。
exhaust Renamed to exhaustAll. Will be removed in v8. 重命名为 exhaustAll。将在 v8 中删除。
flatMap Renamed to mergeMap. Will be removed in v8. 重命名为 mergeMap。将在 v8 中删除。
multicast Will be removed in v8. Use the connectable observable, the connect operator or the share operator instead. See the overloads below for equivalent replacement examples of this operator's behaviors. Details: 将在 v8 中删除。请改用 connectable observable、connect 操作符或 share 操作符。有关此操作符行为的等效替换示例，请参见下面的重载。详细信息：
pluck Use map and optional chaining: `pluck('foo', 'bar')` is `map(x => x?.foo?.bar)`. Will be removed in v8. 使用 map 和可选链接： `pluck('foo', 'bar')` is `map(x => x?.foo?.bar)`。将在 v8 中删除。
publish Will be removed in v8. Use the connectable observable, the connect operator or the share operator instead. See the overloads below for equivalent replacement examples of this operator's behaviors. Details: 将在 v8 中删除。请改用 connectable observable、connect 操作符或 share 操作符。有关此操作符行为的等效替换示例，请参见下面的重载。详细信息：
publishBehavior Will be removed in v8. To create a connectable observable that uses a BehaviorSubject under the hood, use connectable. `source.pipe(publishBehavior(initValue))` is equivalent to `connectable(source, { connector: () => new BehaviorSubject(initValue), resetOnDisconnect: false })`. If you're using refCount after `publishBehavior`, use the share operator instead. `source.pipe(publishBehavior(initValue), refCount())` is equivalent to `source.pipe(share({ connector: () => new BehaviorSubject(initValue), resetOnError: false, resetOnComplete: false, resetOnRefCountZero: false }))`. Details: 将在 v8 中删除。要创建一个在底层使用 BehaviorSubject 的可连接 observable，请使用 connectable。`source.pipe(publishBehavior(initValue))` 等价于 connectable `connectable(source, { connector: () => new BehaviorSubject(initValue), resetOnDisconnect: false })`。如果你在 `publishBehavior` 之后使用 refCount，请改用 share 操作符。`source.pipe(publishBehavior(initValue), refCount())` 等价于 `source.pipe(share({ connector: () => new BehaviorSubject(initValue), resetOnError: false, resetOnComplete: false, resetOnRefCountZero: false }))`。详细信息：
publishLast Will be removed in v8. To create a connectable observable with an AsyncSubject under the hood, use connectable. `source.pipe(publishLast())` is equivalent to `connectable(source, { connector: () => new AsyncSubject(), resetOnDisconnect: false })`. If you're using refCount after `publishLast`, use the share operator instead. `source.pipe(publishLast(), refCount())` is equivalent to `source.pipe(share({ connector: () => new AsyncSubject(), resetOnError: false, resetOnComplete: false, resetOnRefCountZero: false }))`. Details: 将在 v8 中删除。要在底层使用 AsyncSubject 创建可连接的 observable，请使用 connectable。`source.pipe(publishLast())` 等价于 connectable `connectable(source, { connector: () => new AsyncSubject(), resetOnDisconnect: false })`。如果你在 `publishLast` 之后使用 refCount，请改用 share 操作符。`source.pipe(publishLast(), refCount())` 等价于 `source.pipe(share({ connector: () => new AsyncSubject(), resetOnError: false, resetOnComplete: false, resetOnRefCountZero: false }))`。详细信息：
publishReplay Will be removed in v8. Use the connectable observable, the connect operator or the share operator instead. See the overloads below for equivalent replacement examples of this operator's behaviors. Details: 将在 v8 中删除。请改用 connectable observable、connect 操作符或 share 操作符。有关此操作符行为的等效替换示例，请参见下面的重载。详细信息：
refCount Replaced with the share operator. How `share` is used will depend on the connectable observable you created just prior to the `refCount` operator. Details: 替换为 share 操作符。如何使用 `share` 取决于你在 `refCount` 操作符之前创建的可连接 observable。详细信息：
startWith The `scheduler` parameter will be removed in v8. Use `scheduled` and `concatAll`. Details: `scheduler` 参数将在 v8 中删除。使用 `scheduled` 和 `concatAll`。详细信息：
SubscribableOrPromise Do not use. Most likely you want to use `ObservableInput`. Will be removed in v8. 不使用。你很可能想使用 `ObservableInput`。将在 v8 中删除。
ObservableLike Renamed to InteropObservable. Will be removed in v8. 重命名为 InteropObservable。将在 v8 中删除。
ObservedValuesFromArray Renamed to ObservedValueUnionFromArray. Will be removed in v8. 重命名为 ObservedValueUnionFromArray。将在 v8 中删除。
combineAll Renamed to combineLatestAll. Will be removed in v8. 重命名为 combineLatestAll。将在 v8 中删除。
combineLatest Replaced with combineLatestWith. Will be removed in v8. 已替换为 combineLatestWith。将在 v8 中删除。
concat Replaced with concatWith. Will be removed in v8. 已替换为 concatWith。将在 v8 中删除。
exhaust Renamed to exhaustAll. Will be removed in v8. 重命名为 exhaustAll。将在 v8 中删除。
merge Replaced with mergeWith. Will be removed in v8. 替换为 mergeWith。将在 v8 中删除。
flatMap Renamed to mergeMap. Will be removed in v8. 重命名为 mergeMap。将在 v8 中删除。
multicast Will be removed in v8. Use the connectable observable, the connect operator or the share operator instead. See the overloads below for equivalent replacement examples of this operator's behaviors. Details: 将在 v8 中删除。请改用 connectable observable、connect 操作符或 share 操作符。有关此操作符行为的等效替换示例，请参见下面的重载。详细信息：
partition Replaced with the `partition` static creation function. Will be removed in v8. 替换为 `partition` 静态创建功能。将在 v8 中删除。
pluck Use map and optional chaining: `pluck('foo', 'bar')` is `map(x => x?.foo?.bar)`. Will be removed in v8. 使用 map 和可选链接： `pluck('foo', 'bar')` is `map(x => x?.foo?.bar)`。将在 v8 中删除。
publish Will be removed in v8. Use the connectable observable, the connect operator or the share operator instead. See the overloads below for equivalent replacement examples of this operator's behaviors. Details: 将在 v8 中删除。请改用 connectable observable、connect 操作符或 share 操作符。有关此操作符行为的等效替换示例，请参见下面的重载。详细信息：
publishBehavior Will be removed in v8. To create a connectable observable that uses a BehaviorSubject under the hood, use connectable. `source.pipe(publishBehavior(initValue))` is equivalent to `connectable(source, { connector: () => new BehaviorSubject(initValue), resetOnDisconnect: false })`. If you're using refCount after `publishBehavior`, use the share operator instead. `source.pipe(publishBehavior(initValue), refCount())` is equivalent to `source.pipe(share({ connector: () => new BehaviorSubject(initValue), resetOnError: false, resetOnComplete: false, resetOnRefCountZero: false }))`. Details: 将在 v8 中删除。要创建一个在底层使用 BehaviorSubject 的可连接 observable，请使用 connectable。`source.pipe(publishBehavior(initValue))` 等价于 connectable `connectable(source, { connector: () => new BehaviorSubject(initValue), resetOnDisconnect: false })`。如果你在 `publishBehavior` 之后使用 refCount，请改用 share 操作符。`source.pipe(publishBehavior(initValue), refCount())` 等价于 `source.pipe(share({ connector: () => new BehaviorSubject(initValue), resetOnError: false, resetOnComplete: false, resetOnRefCountZero: false }))`。详细信息：
publishLast Will be removed in v8. To create a connectable observable with an AsyncSubject under the hood, use connectable. `source.pipe(publishLast())` is equivalent to `connectable(source, { connector: () => new AsyncSubject(), resetOnDisconnect: false })`. If you're using refCount after `publishLast`, use the share operator instead. `source.pipe(publishLast(), refCount())` is equivalent to `source.pipe(share({ connector: () => new AsyncSubject(), resetOnError: false, resetOnComplete: false, resetOnRefCountZero: false }))`. Details: 将在 v8 中删除。要在底层使用 AsyncSubject 创建可连接的 observable，请使用 connectable。`source.pipe(publishLast())` 等价于 connectable `connectable(source, { connector: () => new AsyncSubject(), resetOnDisconnect: false })`。如果你在 `publishLast` 之后使用 refCount，请改用 share 操作符。`source.pipe(publishLast(), refCount())` 等价于 `source.pipe(share({ connector: () => new AsyncSubject(), resetOnError: false, resetOnComplete: false, resetOnRefCountZero: false }))`。详细信息：
publishReplay Will be removed in v8. Use the connectable observable, the connect operator or the share operator instead. See the overloads below for equivalent replacement examples of this operator's behaviors. Details: 将在 v8 中删除。请改用 connectable observable、connect 操作符或 share 操作符。有关此操作符行为的等效替换示例，请参见下面的重载。详细信息：
race Replaced with raceWith. Will be removed in v8. 替换为 raceWith。将在 v8 中删除。
refCount Replaced with the share operator. How `share` is used will depend on the connectable observable you created just prior to the `refCount` operator. Details: 替换为 share 操作符。如何使用 `share` 取决于你在 `refCount` 操作符之前创建的可连接 observable。详细信息：
startWith The `scheduler` parameter will be removed in v8. Use `scheduled` and `concatAll`. Details: `scheduler` 参数将在 v8 中删除。使用 `scheduled` 和 `concatAll`。详细信息：
zip Replaced with zipWith. Will be removed in v8. 替换为 zipWith。将在 v8 中删除。
